entry.title: BCD Changes Report, Tue Apr 09 2024 12:00:38 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time) - Tue Apr 16 2024 16:18:55 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)
entry.summary: Weekly summary of changes to BCD data
entry.content:
BCD Changes Report, Tue Apr 16 2024

Summary of BCD changes
from Tue Apr 09 2024 12:00:38 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)
to Tue Apr 16 2024 16:18:55 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)

Added Features: 14

Expand to see the full list

api

  1. Headers ➞ iterate_combined_duplicates
  2. Headers ➞ iterate_lexicographically
  3. PerformanceScriptTiming ➞ sourceCharPosition
  4. PerformanceScriptTiming ➞ sourceURL

css

javascript
